definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to the Ptolemy dynasty of pharaohs , the Ptolemies , rulers of Hellenistic Egypt .
Of or pertaining to the astronomer Claudius Ptolemy .

main_definition: ( historical ) Of or pertaining to the Ptolemy dynasty of pharaohs , the Ptolemies , rulers of Hellenistic Egypt .
secondary_definitions: ( astronomy ) Of or pertaining to the astronomer Claudius Ptolemy .
